Preparing data
==============

:doc:`dsistudio`
-----------------
  Use DSI Studio to reconstruct DWI and register data to standard space

:doc:`connectomemapper`
------------------------
  Use the Connectome Mapper to make (sub)cortical parcellations of T1 data

:doc:`mongodb`
---------------
  Configure a mongodb database to hold your tractography data.

.. toctree::
   :hidden:

   dsistudio
   connectomemapper
   mongodb
